actions.text: Read second time and referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code to allow armed forces more time to reinvest the proceeds of sale of a principal residence without recognition of gain when they have served on extended active duty outside the United States.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to extend the time period in which Armed Forces members who have served on extended active duty outside the United States may reinvest the proceeds of sale of a principal residence without recognition of gain.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code to allow armed forces more time to reinvest the proceeds of sale of a principal residence without recognition of gain when they have served on extended active duty outside the United States.
